about: v1.0.Beta: The Knight World list is a mix of the E-UK und NetEA Knight lists, with stats und structure taken from both. As these lists are based on the retro-40k 1990s fluff, most Knights have had their names changed to prevent naming conflicts with the Knights in the current fluff.

The biggest change from the E-UK und the NetEA Knights is obviously the fact that Knights no longer are DC2 WE, but are H-AV instead. This change makes Knight formations a lot more sane to play with/against, und makes it a lot easier to stay within the EA rules. It also means that sniping the Baron mit einemPin-Point is no longer an issue.
Another significant change is that the Retainer formations are more accessible, making the list a bit more flexible.
